page.title: 12Weekly shopping in Streetly
page.content:
My mum goes to Kwik Save on Chester Road when she goes shopping. She also goes to Kelly's Supermarket in Boundary Court. It is the shop nearest Hundred Acre Road. Paul and I found out that in our class most people went to Kwik Save. 14 out of 29 go there. The 2nd most popular was 4 for the new Fine Fare in Queslett Road. 1 goes to Carrefour at Minworth and 1 goes to Marks and Spencers. Paul's mum goes to Fine Fare the most. She goes there in a mini 850 and my mum goes in her Volkswagen Golf car. Most people go to a supermarket once a week.
by Paul Meadows and Jonathan Stear
